name: Zero Balloon
description:
This is my first released game in Godot game engine. The style of the game is inspired by Hotline Miami. The music in the games is by Zeropage (https://www.youtube.com/user/zeropage). Zeropage is a Swiss music collective that makes weird enough music for me to like it. To honor this artist, I called the game Zero Balloon.

If you want more cool games like this one please consider donating. it will help a lot! You can donate either here or with Bitcoin to this address: 3N2kz2Gj9u5CFrbe8zHmFDnXbQaCEJoydr

ALL people who donate will be listed in the about page in the game! Thank you so much!

I am an indie game developer travelling around in an old ford transit van and making games. Here is more about my vanlife : https://www.instagram.com/two.in.van/.
